fact_list.fact_text: Bus Priority Box, indicated by a yellow section, signifies a mandatory give-way to buses area.
Drivers should slow down and watch out for buses pulling out of the bus bay.
Drivers must stop before the give-way line and give way to buses exiting the bus bay.
Bus-stop separator areas are painted red to alert motorists of merging vehicles from bus-stops.
Vehicles are not allowed to drive or park in the enhanced chevron zone.
